game.name: Just a Simple Turn-Based RPG
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A short and straightforward turn-based RPG where every action matters. Explore, cast spells through quirky enchantments, help the townsfolk, and hunt for treasure, without endless grinding or overcomplicated stories.
